name: Idle Progress
description:
Idle Progress - A free idle game where your task is to produce as many resources as possible, improve your weapons and armor for good attacks, create good fishing rods for a good catch and get legendary stuff by completing legendary quests.

You can either just farm by upgrading your production or equip a weapon and armor to start fighting for better resources, better crafts and to earn the LEGENDARY ITEMS!

- Over 4 epic legendary quests to complete
- Build infrastructure with resources to increase population
- Try your self at science to create interesting creatures
- Increase your Game Skill by selling/crafting/melting stuff
- Spend some time unboxing treasures to get cool rare items
- Or you can simply relax while you are fishing
